Headline: #8 Halsted and #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Reroute near Halsted/43rd
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted and 44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Halsted/43rd, due to street blockage near Halsted/43rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#8 Halsted and #44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Halsted/43rd, due to street blockage near Halsted/43rd.

Southbound #8 Halsted buses will operate via Halsted, 43rd, Union, 47th, Halsted and over regular route.

Northbound #8 Halsted buses will operate via Halsted, 47th, Union, 43rd, Halsted and over regular route.

Southbound #44 Wallace/Racine buses will operate via Halsted, 43rd, Union, 47th, Halsted and over regular route.

Northbound #44 Wallace/Racine buses will operate via Halsted, 47th, Union, 43rd, Halsted and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/77th
ShortDescription: #8 Halsted buses are rerouted via Halsted, 76th, Racine, 79th, then resume their normal route on Halsted, due to fire department activity near Halsted/77th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, 76th, Racine, 79th, then resume their normal route on Halsted, due to fire department activity near Halsted/77th.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed near California
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at California due to an obstruction. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at California due to an obstruction.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#52 Kedzie/California

#94 South California

Shuttle buses are requested to provide connecting service. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
